document.title: Tennessee Academic Standards for Fine Arts

A75E237109FE4F46BB135331710692DE.description:
Distinguish different ways art is used to represent, establish,
reinforce, and reflect group identity.

0E5F0FD24DC147BDA00FF7480EC91FB5.description:
Make art collaboratively to reflect on and reinforce positive
aspects of group identity.

BEC51D0214AA40FB8357D9CDA01605B1.description:
Construct a persuasive and logical argument to support an
evaluation of art.

5563E33C518B45928DE919DEECCA7AFA.description:
8.VA.R2.A Interpret art by analyzing how mood and meaning are impacted
by the relationship of subject matter, use of media, art-making approaches,
and relevant context while using appropriate art vocabulary

A1F0AC0ADC0F4FA1B49F954639A0F145.description:
Explain how aesthetic choices are influenced by visual and
material cultures and can impact perceived meaning of artworks.

AED1B845411941A58B65374F2ABDEBB2.description:
Compare and contrast contexts and media in which viewers
encounter images that influence ideas, emotions, and actions.

8B370C5A04D1491FAD9EDE081CD0AE6A.description:
Analyze why and how an exhibition or collection may influence
ideas, beliefs, and experiences.

F3BF67AFDEBC420B8DDF801296BF42EC.description:
Collaboratively prepare and present selected theme-based
artwork for display, and formulate exhibition narratives for the viewer.

C83E57985D974B18A56BCB60C7D22AE9.description:
Develop and apply criteria for evaluating a collection of artwork
for presentation.

3726FAD83BED4C90B61092EBFA9F0533.description:
Apply relevant criteria to examine, reflect on, and plan
revisions for a work of art or design in progress.

26F657CC5FC546FA941C1C9CC27B92E6.description:
Select, organize, and design images and words to make
visually clear and compelling presentations.

CFAABE65C9524F38A6A751F26076353C.description:
Demonstrate awareness of ethical responsibility and the use of
images, materials, tools, and equipment in the creation and presentation of
original work.

DB6A4ECFBE1D48698F533B9D0946A970.description:
Experiment, innovate, and take risks to pursue ideas, forms,
and meanings that emerge when making art, using course specific
craftsmanship.

2113B6F3722F455CAC1140B8C8622CBB.description:
Collaboratively investigate an aspect of contemporary life
utilizing art and design.

E8447E77544B4307BEC496492CB4EDB4.description:
Document early stages of the creative process using traditional
or emerging media.
